replies.body: At least our Illaoi is cute.
Usually they say, brighter or colorful frogs are poisonous, doesn't it work for illaoi too? I would rather have a black mamba on my team than a mid sized python.

> [{quoted}](name=Slice n Dice em,realm=EUW,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=kifFJ8Me,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2018-04-22T13:23:38.319+0000)
>
> Usually they say, brighter or colorful frogs are poisonous, doesn't it work for illaoi too? I would rather have a black mamba on my team than a mid sized python.

One of the creatures with the most potent venom in the world is the blue ringed octopus, a creature the size of a human palm.
I'm just gonna avoid all bodies of water now, thanks

Yeah, she spits out the venom known as toxicity, and ragequit-eness.

Trust me, I attended an introductory medical seminar for 3 minutes, so I know what I'm talking about.

Man, that seminar was hella boring. I only got 4 points on Flappy Bird.
I want our illaoi she looks cuter.
